title: Ticket #7299: Add type stubs to Python bindings
description:
Python type stubs (.pyi files, see https://github.com/python/mypy/wiki/Creating-Stubs-For-Python-Modules) are very useful for static code analyzers and IDEs, especially since the Python bindings are compiled binaries and static code analyzers don't see inside them.

See https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor-restd/blob/master/htcondor.pyi and https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor-restd/blob/master/classad.pyi for a starting point.

I marked this for 8.9 but since this has no actual effect on code, it can probably go into 8.8.
remarks:
2019-Oct-04 23:39:28 by karpel:
Will require some (small) changes to our setup.py, and inclusion of an extra marker file: https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installed_packages.html#making-pep-561-compatible-packages
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.
